Title: Odd dimensional manifolds with highly connected covers
Abstract: © 2018 World Scientific Publishing Company.We show that for each integer n ≥ 3 any finite group G acts smoothly and freely on a connected sum (Sn × Sn+1) (Sn × Sn+1) r for some r. Moreover, as a module over Z[G], the middle dimensional homotopy group can be specified in advance to belong to the stable syzygy n+1G(Z).
